data.text: N ma Mangɛ Ala, n i matɔxɔma nɛ, n i xili tantuma nɛ abadan.
Lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ n i matɔxɔma nɛ, n i xili tantuma nɛ abadan.
Alatala sɛnbɛ gbo, matɔxɔɛ birin na a tan nan bɛ,
Yi waxati mixie fama nɛ i xa kaabanakoe falade boore waxati mixie bɛ.
E fama nɛ i xa nɔrɛ tofanyi masende.
E fama nɛ i sɛnbɛ magaaxuxi xa fe falade.
E fama nɛ ɲɛlɛxinde i xa hinnɛ xungbe ra,
Alatala hinnɛ mixi ra, a kinikini,
Alatala fe fanyi rabama mixi birin bɛ,
Alatala, i xa daalie birin i matɔxɔma nɛ,
E i xa mangɛya xungbe xa fe masenma nɛ,
alako mixie xa i xa kaabanakoe kolon, a nun i xa mangɛya nɔrɔxi.
I xa mangɛya mu ɲɔnma nɛ, i xa nɔɛ buma nɛ abadan.
Alatala bira mixi malima,
Duniɲa birin a xaxili tixi i ra,
I tan nan i bɛlɛxɛ rabima,
Alatala tinxin a xa fe birin kui,
Alatala makɔrɛ a maxandilae ra,
A a yaragaaxuie waxɔnfe rabama nɛ,
Alatala a xanuntenyie makantama nɛ,
N dɛ Alatala matɔxɔma nɛ.
